strapiPost.title: January Art on the Bricks in Downtown Rogers Tonight
strapiPost.content:
Roger's January Art on the Bricks is here to warm your soul and brighten your day with its Finding Light in the Dark of Winter art walk.

  • On display: Tonight from 4:30-7:30p join the community of downtown Rogers for an evening of the arts with exhibits, music, and local food vendors. Featuring local artists and their creations, the art walk is sure to inspire and delight.
  • Shoutout: This month's highlight is with the Arkansas Arts Academy students art work and curriculum. Stroll through the downtown and explore the galleries and businesses that showcase the art.

Don't let the winter blues get you down, find some light in the dark of winter HERE.
